meanings.definition: Secret or dishonest activity or maneuvering
meanings.sent1: The group of kids were up to some shenanigans in the abandoned house.
meanings.sent2: I heard about the shenanigans happening behind the scenes at work.
meanings.sent3: The detective uncovered the shenanigans of the criminal mastermind.
meanings.sent4: The politician's shenanigans were finally exposed to the public.
meanings.sent5: The movie plot was full of shenanigans and unexpected twists.

meanings.sent1: The children's playful shenanigans brightened up the party.
meanings.sent2: The puppy's shenanigans kept everyone entertained in the park.
meanings.sent3: Grandpa always gets into funny shenanigans when he tells jokes.
meanings.sent4: The comedian's shenanigans had the audience roaring with laughter.
meanings.sent5: The circus clown's shenanigans made the audience burst into giggles.
